latest_updates.text:
Dear Braindex Backers!

You are awesome!!! Braindex reached the funding goal close to 48 Hrs !!!!  We are super excited about your love on Braindex!

We deeply appreciate your support and hope Braindex will make a big difference in your life...It's your support that builds and maintains our confidence in brain science.  

 

Thank you so much!

Warm regards,

 

Braindex Team

latest_updates.text:
Dear the Bebird Fam,

We've been asked by many of you for a demo video on how to use the Bebird X17 pro. Check out this freshly made video below- we hope this helps you to better learn the product.

BIG NEWS!!

We're also excited to announce that we are now over $300,000 FUNDED! Celebrate the moment with us as our community grows bigger and stronger.

We'll be continually updating you with lifestyle/factory/use images and videos of Bebird. Stay tuned! Meanwhile, if there's any specific feature you'd like to see us performing- comment on the page and we'll be sure to get your concerns solved.

Make sure to also share our innovation on social media. Thanks again for your great support!

Love,

The Bebird Team

response.title: GPD WIN Max: Handheld Game Console for AAA Games
response.tagline: Pro processor. Pro gamepad. Pro performance. The ultimate handheld game console. Intel & Win10 OS

latest_updates.text:
In order to avoid fan noise, the Capital indicator of WIN Max

is now changed to the fan silent mode indicator,

and a fan logo is printed on the F key of the keyboard

Turn on silent mode: Fn + F key After turning on,

the fan turns off and the white light flashes

flashing period 1s,on 0.5s,off 0.5s

After being turned on,the temperature below 50℃，

fan 1 remains 30% rotate speed.When above 50℃,

dual-fan keep the 30% rotate speed.

The white light goes off after entering S3(STR:Suspen to RAM),

and S3(STR:Suspend to RAM) comes back to

maintain the state before entering S3(STR:Suspend to RAM)

PS:the status prompt of the Caps look key is

supported by the system optimization software which developed by GPD.

latest_updates.text:
We are currently taking all orders for July/August (depending on model). You can see your expected delivery time by checking your order summary. We really appreciate your patience with this.

We also want to confirm that all current orders and future orders come with the NFC disc as standard (this has been the case since February) so you won't need to order the disc separately. 

Thank you for your support during this difficult time and hope you are all safe and healthy.

latest_updates.text:
It feels like a dream -  but we are 500% funded!!! The entire team cannot express our gratitude enough. We are completely blown away by the support and will work this week to come up with new perks to celebrate! 

Thank you to everyone who has backed this project. Your contributions provide crucial resources to LGBTQ+ people in need during an unprecedented crisis.

From the depths of our hearts, thank you, thank you, thank you.

latest_updates.text:
Ben's been answering hundreds of tickets about frame size and fit. In addition he's helped many riders who have come into the San Diego shop for test rides.

Based on what he's seen, Ben's put together an update to the previous video about which frame size to choose. 

 

Subscribe to the FLX YouTube Channel to see the next update first.

 

In summary: If you're in between sizes or have limited mobility - your best bet is the smaller 19" frame. It will be an easier fit and more adaptable to your needs. 

I really want to acknowledge Ben for going above and beyond to recognize these nuances and make this video. Ben's put his ego aside and has your best interest at heart. That's what FLX is all about! We want to make sure you get the best fit for you. 

After watching this video, if you need to request a change in your frame size, please email us at hello@flx.bike. Ben will personally see to it that your order is updated. 

 

 

In Other News:

The support team has chipped away at the backlog of over 900 tickets and are now at just under 300. 

Their hard work continues as the campaign comes to a close. 

Production continues.

We will finalize the box design by the end of this month. 

 

More to come.

 

 

We Love You,

Rob, Pete and Team FLX

 

 

PS:

If you missed the touring package and other accessories at checkout, you can watch this video about how to order them below.

Note: This will not work with google pay or apple pay.

 

 

Click This Link To Choose Your Accessories
